channel.title: Phones on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Phones on Andy Dyer

item.title: Why I'm Unironically Carrying This Small, Older Android Phone
item.description: I thoroughly enjoyed my last night in Berlin a little over a week ago; so much that I didn't notice my phone was missing until the end of the night. Shake your head and say it couldn't happen to you. I thought the same thing until it did. Normally, I keep my phone in one of my front pockets, but I was wearing a coat that covered the pocket, making it a bit more difficult to grab my phone quickly to check Google Maps.
